results.description: Sassuolo's Francesco Magnanelli and Parma's Matteo Scozzarella are given one-match bans for blasphemy during Serie A matches.
results.shortTitle: Two Serie A players given blasphemy ban
results.title: Serie A blasphemy bans: Francesco Magnanelli & Matteo Scozzarella suspended

results.description: Romelu Lukaku scores twice as Serie A title chasers Inter Milan survive a fightback to beat Sassuolo.
results.shortTitle: Lukaku scores twice in Inter Milan win
results.title: Romelu Lukaku scores twice as Inter Milan beat Sassuolo 4-3

results.description: On-loan Arsenal forward Henrikh Mkhitaryan scores on his debut as AS Roma beat Sassuolo 4-2 in Serie A.
results.title: Henrikh Mkhitaryan scores on Roma debut as Italian side beat Sassuolo

results.description: Midfielder Pedro Obiang has left West Ham to join Serie A side Sassuolo for a reported fee of £7.2m.
results.shortTitle: Obiang leaves West Ham for Sassuolo
results.title: Pedro Obiang: West Ham midfielder joins Serie A side Sassuolo

results.description: Cristiano Ronaldo scores his 20th Juventus goal as the unbeaten champions beat Sassuolo to go 11 points clear at the top of Serie A.
results.shortTitle: Ronaldo scores as Juve go 11 points clear
results.title: Sassuolo 0-3 Juventus: Cristiano Ronaldo scores as champions go 11 points clear

results.description: "A far-fetched deal" but one that comes with no risk? Why did Barcelona move for Kevin-Prince Boateng?
results.shortTitle: Crazy, clever, desperate? Why have Barcelona signed Boateng?
results.title: Kevin-Prince Boateng: Why have Barcelona signed journeyman forward?

results.description: Ex-Tottenham and Portsmouth forward Kevin-Prince Boateng completes a "dream" move to Barcelona on loan for the rest of the season.
results.shortTitle: Boateng in surprise Barcelona loan move
results.title: Barcelona: Kevin-Prince Boateng makes 'dream' loan move from Sassuolo

results.description: Reigning champions Juventus host Sassuolo in Serie A at Allianz Stadium - follow live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Juventus v Sassuolo - Ronaldo scores first Juve goal
results.title: Follow live text commentary of Juventus v Sassuolo in Serie A

results.description: Inter Milan's Champions League qualification hopes are no longer in their own hands after a loss to mid-table Sassuolo.
results.title: Inter Milan 1-2 Sassuolo

results.description: Reported Manchester United target Sergej Milinkovic-Savic scores twice as Lazio beat Sassuolo to move up to third in Serie A.
results.title: Sassuolo 0-3 Lazio

results.description: Gonzalo Higuain scores a hat-trick as Juventus thrash Sassuolo to move top of Serie A.
results.title: Juventus 7-0 Sassuolo

results.description: Benevento break Manchester United's record for the worst ever start in the top five European leagues after conceding in added time to Sassuolo.
results.title: Benevento 1-2 Sassuolo

results.description: Paulo Dybala marks his 100th game for Juventus with a hat-trick as they keep up a 100% Serie A record by beating Sassuolo.
results.title: Sassuolo 1-3 Juventus

results.description: Inter Milan's Curva Nord ultras walk out of their game against Sassuolo after 25 minutes in protest at the running of the club.
results.title: Inter Milan 1-2 Sassuolo

results.description: Follow live text commentary, images and social media as Barcelona face Valencia plus updates from Roma v Sassuolo and Paris St-Germain v Lyon.
results.title: La Liga: Barcelona v Valencia

results.description: Juventus go four points clear at the top of Serie A with a comfortable win over Sassuolo, with Roma losing to Sampdoria.
results.title: Sassuolo 0-2 Juventus
